conclusion: Trace the path of liquid from each opening through baffles to containers.
Liquid from A will hit the gray baffle, slanted downwards to the right.
Liquid from A flows downwards and to the right, hitting the green baffle.
Green baffle is slanted downwards to the left.
Liquid from A is directed towards the left into container E.
Liquid from B will hit the gray baffle, slanted downwards to the right.
Liquid from B flows downwards and to the right, hitting the green baffle.
Green baffle is slanted downwards to the left.
Liquid from B is directed towards the left into container E.
Liquid from C will hit the purple baffle, slanted downwards to the left.
Liquid from C flows downwards and to the left, hitting the pink baffle.
Pink baffle is slanted downwards to the right.
Liquid from C is directed towards the right into container F.
Liquid from D will hit the pink baffle, slanted downwards to the right.
Liquid from D flows downwards and to the right, hitting the black baffle.
Black baffle is slanted downwards to the left.
Liquid from D is directed towards the left into container F.
Liquid from A and B will flow into container E; liquid from C and D will flow into container F.
